## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a> promotion pass.

This pass walks the functions in each SCC and for each one tries to transform it and all of its callers to replace indirect arguments with direct (by-value) arguments.

Definition at line 23 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/argumentpromotion-h">ArgumentPromotion.h</a>.
